titles.title: SD Gundam World: Sangoku Souketsuden
SDガンダムワールド 三国創傑伝
SD Gundam World: Sangoku Soketsuden

anime.description: A mysterious virus called the “Yellow Zombie Virus” has been spreading across the land for the past several years, and the infected, who lose their self of self, start attacking Mobile Suits one after the next. In order to protect themselves from the infected, the remaining Mobile Suits are forced to live inside city strongholds. However, behind the fortifications, after the death of the former lord, the lord Dong Zhuo is as domineering as can be. As if led by fate, after meeting Guan Yu Nu Gundam and Zhang Fei God Gundam, Liu Bei Unicorn Gundam resolves to save the world. Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: half-length episodes
tag.description: Half-length episodes are regular episodes that are somewhat shorter than the standard length. This includes episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length; shows with episodes up to and including 10 minutes are http://anidb.net/t5852 [short episodes] instead.

episode.title: 龍の矜持
Dragon`s Watch
Ryuu no Kyouji
episode.summary: It is an age in which the world is in ruins after repeated wars, but is beginning to show signs of recovery. Liu Bei Unicorn Gundam, who lives in the Shu Area, leads the vigilante group “Dragon’s Watch” and protects the city. One day, he spots two men being pursued by Bugs. Liu Bei sets off to rescue them along with Ma Chao Gundam Barbatos and Zhao Yun 00 Gundam, other protectors of the city. As the youths are led to a meeting with destiny, the tale of their adventure to save the world begins here! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星を読む者
One Who Reads the Stars
Hoshi o Yomu Mono
episode.summary: Liu Bei and the others have rescues two men from a horde of Bugs. Their names are Guan Yu Nu Gundam and Zhang Fei God Gundam. They and Liu Bei swear brotherhood to each other, and they set out on a quest to find the Zhuge Liang Freedom Gundam, who is said to be the key to saving the world. Liu Bei and the others arrive at the caverns that go through to Zhuge Liang’s laboratory. As they progress through them, countless traps are waiting inside for them. Will Liu Bei and the others be able to meet Zhuge Liang unharmed in the end? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 青き炎の翼
Blue Wing
Aoki Honoo no Tsubasa
episode.summary: “Blue Wing” is the military-industrial complex of the Wei Area, and it is run by the young CEO Cao Cao Wing Gundam. In order to resolve the misery in Luoyang and the Trinity supply issues, Cao Cao had pressed the feudal lord Dong Zhuo Providence Gundam with questions, but Dong Zhuo would not listen. Sima Yi Destiny Gundam also intercedes, and Cao Cao finishes talks, but as he tries to leave Luoyang for later, an evil force swoops in on him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 天翔る赤い虎
Red Tiger
Amagakeru Akai Tora
episode.summary: Sun Jian Gundam Astray, head of the distribution guild "Red Tiger," forms an alliance with Cao Cao, whome he is normally hostile to, in order to strike at Dong Zhuo. Each of their forces hurry their preparations so they can depart for battle at Luoyang. Meanwhile, Liu Bei and the others arrive at a certain disused laboratory. This was once a lab where Zhuge Liang did particle research along with Zhang Jue. In the end, will the group be able to find a clue as to how to save the world? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 紅蓮の咆哮
Magma Power
Guren no Houkou
episode.summary: Under the leadership of Cao Cao and Sun Jian, the allied forces storm Dong Zhuo’s castle “Victory Tower,” but inside it is swarming with Bugs. Liu Bei attacks the tower along with Cao Cao, but Lyu Bu Sinanju, the biggest, most powerful enemy of them all, appears before them and stands in their way. Meanwhile, following a small lead, Zhuge Liang reaches his mentor Zhang Jue. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪魔の真実
Yellow Pandemic
Akuma no Shinjitsu
episode.summary: Da Qiao Gundam Artemie and Xiao Qiao GN Archer have been travelling along a secret route, but their way is blocked by Diao Chan Kshatriya. Zhou Yu Akatsuki comes running too, but is forced into a hard fight due to Diao Chan’s poison. Elsewhere, Guan and Zhang Fei start to fight Dong Zhuo, who has revealed his true form. Liu Bei and Cao Cao slowly corner Lyu Bu, but... While the final battle is unfolding for their comrades, Zhang Jue and Zhuge Liang, who has reunited with him, learn a fiendish truth. Source: crunchyroll
